field.name: base_item.artificial
field.description: Tell if the item is artificial. The physics will not be applied to it.

field.name: base_item.can_move_items
field.description: Tell if the item can move other items.

field.name: base_item.global
field.description: Tell if the item is global. The item will progress even if he is not near a player.

field.name: base_item.phantom
field.description: Tell if the item is a phantom. The item will never be aligned by a wall or anything.

field.name: base_item.position.left
field.description: Position of the left edge of the item.

field.name: base_item.position.bottom
field.description: Position of the bottom edge of the item.

field.name: base_item.position.depth
field.description: Z-coordinate of the item in the layer.

field.name: base_item.size.height
field.description: The height of the item.

field.name: base_item.size.width
field.description: The width of the item.

field.name: base_item.mass
field.description: The mass of the item.

field.name: base_item.density
field.description: The density of the item.

field.name: base_item.elasticity
field.description: The elasticity of the item.

field.name: base_item.hardness
field.description: The hardness of the item.

field.name: base_item.system_angle
field.description: Angle applied to the item.

field.name: base_item.fixed.x
field.description: Tell if the item is fixed on x-coordinate.

field.name: base_item.fixed.y
field.description: Tell if the item is fixed on y-coordinate.

field.name: base_item.fixed.z
field.description: Tell if the item is fixed on z-coordinate.

field.name: base_item.speed.x
field.description: The initial horizontal speed of the item.

field.name: base_item.speed.y
field.description: The initial vertical speed of the item.

field.name: base_item.angular_speed
field.description: The initial angular speed of the item.

field.name: base_item.free_system
field.description: Tell if the system angle of the item is not modified by the collisions.
